## Under custody


```{r cars}
total_data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = year,
             y = CUSTOTT)) +
  geom_line(aes(group = st)) +
  labs(x = "Year",
       y = "Total inmates under custody",
       title = "Total inmates under custody by state, 1999-2019") +
  xlim(1978, 1982)

total_data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = year,
             y = CWPRIVM + CWPRIVF)) +
  geom_line(aes(group = st)) +
  labs(x = "Year",
       y = "Total inmates under custody",
       title = "Total inmates under custody by state, 1999-2019") +
  xlim(1999, 2019)
```
